description: Schema for the dev.ocs.i18n@1.0 capability. Defines the server's internationalization support.

defaultLocale.description: The default locale (e.g., 'en-US') used if the client requests an unsupported language. Must be one of the supportedLocales.

supportedLocales.description: A list of all locales the server can provide translated content and formats for.

isRtl.description: Whether this is a right-to-left language, for client UI hints.

numberFormat.description: Rules for formatting numbers in this locale.

decimalSeparator.description: Character used to separate the integer part from the fractional part of a number

groupingSeparator.description: Character used to separate groups of digits in large numbers

currencyFormat.description: Rules for formatting currency in this locale.

position.description: Whether the symbol appears before or after the amount

dateFormat.description: Rules for formatting dates in this locale.

shortDate.description: Short date format pattern (e.g., 'MM/dd/yyyy' for US, 'dd/MM/yyyy' for Europe)

timeFormat.description: Time format pattern (e.g., 'HH:mm' for 24-hour, 'h:mm a' for 12-hour)

updatedAt.description: When the i18n configuration was last updated
